SELECT E.EVENT_NO AS EVENT_NO, C.COM_NM AS EVENT_TYPE, E.EVENT_TTL, E.EVENT_CN, SUBSTR(E.WRTR_YMD, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(E.WRTR_YMD, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(E.WRTR_YMD, 7, 2) AS WRTR_YMD, SUBSTR(E.BGNG_YMD, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(E.BGNG_YMD, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(E.BGNG_YMD, 7, 2) AS BGNG_YMD, SUBSTR(E.EXP_YMD, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(E.EXP_YMD, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(E.EXP_YMD, 7, 2) AS EXP_YMD, E.APRV_YN, E.MNGR_ID, M.MBR_NM, E.RJCT_RSN, G.MENU_NO, G.EVENT_NO, G.COUPON_NM, G.COUPON_CODE, G.DSCNT_AMT, G.ISSU_QTY, M.MENU_NM, F.FILE_GROUP_NO, F.FILE_ORIGINAL_NAME, F.FILE_SAVE_NAME, F.FILE_SAVE_LOCATE FROM EVENT E LEFT OUTER JOIN COUPON_GROUP G ON E.EVENT_NO = G.EVENT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MENU M ON G.MENU_NO = M.MENU_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE C ON E.EVENT_TYPE = C.COM_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M ON E.MNGR_ID = M.MBR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE_DETAIL F ON E.FILE_GROUP_NO = F.FILE_GROUP_NO WHERE E.EVENT_NO = #{eventNo}
